Summary: Going to my car after work 3 red glowing objects were moving across the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsGoing to my car after work at about 20:05 pm (cst)3 red glowing objects were moving across the sky south to north they were very high, but lower than a plane would fly. They were glowing red a bit fuzzy around the edges and pulsating, in the center of each was a white light. Two of the objects disappeared, one kept flying north until it went higher and disappeared. I was looking for someone else near me, but no one was around and I did not have a camera. I noticed it because they were very distinct and I'd never seen anything like them before. I was a bit stunned and in disbelief, I could not readily explain what I had seen it was a very clear night. I've been thinking a lot about it, I wanted to report it, but didn't know who to report it to!
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Fenton
There were no other sightings in Fenton on or around April 9th 2012
